licence_overview:
If you want to operate gaming machines in your premises you must hold an amusement permit.

You must submit your application to the district council in which your premises are located together with a fee. 

A copy of the permit application must also be served on the sub-divisional commander of the police sub-division where your premises are located.

You must comply with any conditions attached to permit.
licence_short_description: An Amusement Permit is to operate gaming machines in your premises.
overview: You need to have an amusement permit to operate gaming machines in your business in Northern Ireland
title: Amusement Permit (Northern Ireland)
